title: Commencement of business
des: Invested shareholders must confirm payment and office address

title: Auditor Appointment
des: Company informs new auditor and submits ADT.1 form to ROC.

title: DIN eKYC
des: Directors share personal information for identification & verification

title: DPT-3
des: Companies report money taken from people to ROC; auditors confirm details.

title: MCA Form AOC-4
des: It's like an official report card for a company's documents

title: MCA Form MGT-7
des: Companies must annually report activities and finances to the registrar.
